title: PLAZA / COIN-OPERATED VIEWER II
description: A coin-operated viewer on the plaza. It offers a view to the church.

dialogueTree.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "This coin-operated viewer is facing..."
dialogueTree.text: This coin-operated viewer is facing southwest. Its coin-slot is full of fossilized bubblegum, rendering the machine permanently inaccessible.

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "The metal feels cold and wet under..."
links.text: The metal feels cold and wet under your palm. It looks unhygienic.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Probably some kids..." The lieuten..."
links.text: "Probably some kids..." The lieutenant inspects the rigged slot.

links.title: Interfacing: "A simple but clever solution to rui..."
links.text: A simple but clever solution to ruining a coin-operated viewer. It took ingenuity.

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "The mute machine is unable to confi..."
links.text: The mute machine is unable to confirm or deny your theory.

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "A thick layer of graffito covers th..."
links.text: A thick layer of graffito covers the lenses -- you spell out the word "ONUC" written on the other side -- with N and C scribbled backwards.

links.title: You: "Shift your focus to the background."
links.text: Shift your focus to the background.

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "Under the graffito a sea of blues a..."
links.text: Under the graffito a sea of blues and greys appears -- behind the water lies a coast studded with concrete and reeds. On it -- a church on stilts, lanky weather-worn wooden planks, an x-shaped cross topping its tower.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You know this to be the Star of Per..."
links.text: You know this to be the Star of Perikarnassis, or the Chi-Rho. The central symbol of the Perikarnassian church -- a star, a great moral height to be strived towards.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The church looks old and weather-wo..."
links.text: The church looks old and weather-worn. There are no lights in the windows.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Around the large wooden building yo..."
links.text: Around the large wooden building you see chunks of sea ice, gathered on the beach. And a small tent set up on the ice.
